page.title: 02RURAL CORNWALL WEST OF TRURO
page.content: Truro is the administrative capital of Cornwall, and is bounded by open countryside. The area which we surveyed was a rural area, to the west of Truro. We have commented in our survey on; Farming, Health, Housing, Landscape, Local History, Religion, Transport, and Ecology. Part of a housing estate near Threemilestone, the main non-casualty hospital for Cornwall (Treliske Hospital), and a few modern light industrial estates, are the main buildings that fall into our area. Other than the buildings, the area is generally covered in grass and scattered farmers' crops. The farms themselves are small, situated around the hilly countryside. Most of the roads in the area are minor roads.
